description: Detects msdt.exe executed by a suspicious parent as seen in CVE-2022-30190 / Follina exploitation
author: Nextron Systems
name: Suspicious MSDT Parent Process
query: (process.parent.executable.text:("*\\cmd.exe" OR "*\\cscript.exe" OR "*\\mshta.exe" OR "*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe" OR "*\\regsvr32.exe" OR "*\\rundll32.exe" OR "*\\schtasks.exe" OR "*\\wmic.exe" OR "*\\wscript.exe" OR "*\\wsl.exe") AND ((process.executable.text:"*\\msdt.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"msdt.exe")))
